San Jamar P4800BK San Jamar FrontLine Countertop Condiment Dispenser Tweet 27 San Jamar P4800BK San Jamar FrontLine Countertop Condiment Dispenser $75.00 $450.00 /l/San-Jamar-P4800BK-San-Jamar-FrontLine-Countertop-Condiment-Dispenser San Jamar FrontLine Condiment Dispenser Countertop Box System 20 1/2 x 7 x 7 inch Item Description: Extremely versatile; use a gallon jar, #10 can or jar, or direct pour into the food safe liner. It is perfect for restaurants, concession areas and convenience stores as it allows placement flexibility and added volume. This extremely versatile system can dispense condiments using a gallon jar, #10 can or jar, or direct pour, making set-up, tear-down, and refills easier than ever. The pump is made of high impact plastic and sits on top of a tamper resistant lid so only your employees can access the inside...
